00020 #ifndef UTIL_ISTRING_HPP
00021 #define UTIL_ISTRING_HPP
00022 
00023 #include <string>
00024 #include <locale>
00025 #include <boost/lexical_cast.hpp>
00026 
00027 namespace isis
00028 {
00029 namespace util
00030 {
00031 namespace _internal
00032 {
00033 struct ichar_traits: public std::char_traits<char> {
00034     static const std::locale loc;
00035     static bool eq ( const char_type &c1, const char_type &c2 );
00036     static bool lt ( const char_type &c1, const char_type &c2 );
00037     static int compare ( const char_type *s1, const char_type *s2, std::size_t n );
00038     static const char_type *find ( const char_type *s, std::size_t n, const char_type &a );
00039 };
00040 }
00041 
00042 typedef std::basic_string<char, _internal::ichar_traits>    istring;
00043 }
00044 }
00045 
00046 namespace std
00047 {
00048 template<typename charT, typename traits>
00049 basic_ostream<charT, traits>& operator<<( basic_ostream<charT, traits> &out, const isis::util::istring &s )
00050 {
00051     return out << s.c_str();
00052 }
00053 }
00054 
00055 namespace boost
00056 {
00057 // specialization for boost::lexical_cast to differ std::string and util::istring
00058 template<> isis::util::istring lexical_cast<isis::util::istring, std::string>        ( const std::string         &arg );
00059 // specialization for boost::lexical_cast to differ std::string and util::istring
00060 template<> std::string         lexical_cast<std::string,         isis::util::istring>( const isis::util::istring &arg );
00061 }
